name: WORDex: Cryptex Word Game
description:
Play the brand new, gorgeous cryptex word game with a renaissance art style!
HOW TO PLAY
- Search words or clues on the cryptex panel
- Rotate the cryptex to match the correct words
- Slide and drag fingers vertically to rotate the cryptex
- "Skip" the level when you get stuck

FEATURES
- Free to play
- Unlimited challenging levels, updated weekly
- 4 difficulties suitable for both kids and adults
- Casually play style with no time limit
- Offline
- Relaxing sound effects
- Renaissance art style
- Inspired by cryptex, a portable vault to hide secret messages from The Da Vinci Code, 2003, Dan Brown

E-mail us : hkgame2019@gmail.com
